channel.title: Log in Message?
channel.description:
What is the code to add to make it so when you log in it says something, like welcome to HiScape.
Thanks

item.title: Log in Message?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“Tylerholmes, post:2, topic:329921”]sM("Welcome to [Your Server Here] “+playerName+” ! ");
sM(“Official Website - [Your Web Here]”);
sM(“Vote for [Your Server Here] - [Your Voting Site Here]”);

Regards![/quote]

But remember some servers don’t have a ‘sendMessage’ > ‘sM’ conversion…

[quote author=Tylerholmes link=topic=426307.msg3131352#msg3131352 date=1266532864]
sendMessage("Welcome to [Your Server Here] "+playerName+" ! ");
sendMessage("Official Website - [Your Web Here]");
sendMessage("Vote for [Your Server Here] - [Your Voting Site Here]");

If that doesn’t work use

[quote author=Tylerholmes link=topic=426307.msg3131352#msg3131352 date=1266532864]
sM("Welcome to [Your Server Here] "+playerName+" ! ");
sM("Official Website - [Your Web Here]");
sM("Vote for [Your Server Here] - [Your Voting Site Here]");

Or search for an existing log-in message. (;

Read full topic

item.title: Log in Message?
item.dc:creator: @Tylerholmes Tylerholmes
item.description:
@Tylerholmes wrote:

sM("Welcome to [Your Server Here] “+playerName+” ! ");
sM(“Official Website - [Your Web Here]”);
sM(“Vote for [Your Server Here] - [Your Voting Site Here]”);

Regards!
